title: Round the twist: Santa Claws
creator_credit: Australian Children's Television Foundation, Antonia Barnard, Mark Lewis and Paul Jennings
brief_description: Pete’s dream comes true when he meets Santa Claws Number 115,302 who grants each member of the Twist family two wishes, something they all end up wishing had never happened.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Children’s Television Foundation, Antonia Barnard, Mark Lewis and Paul Jennings
